group_1.textRight: Our first stop will be the site of a @Christmas illumination show.
It's not so bad during the daytime, but at night... @This area will be packed.
Well, if you'd like to take your time while @you see the lights...
I'd consider making a reservation at one of the @restaurants on Main Street.

group_1.textLeft: Um... But a...restaurant reservation might be...

group_1.textRight: Ah, right, it's a bit too much for middle schoolers.
Let's see... @What other places were you considering?

group_1.textLeft: It’s just because I heard...@That the night parade is beautiful... Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Ooh, yes, it's gorgeous! @I think that's worth looking into as well.
Are you feeling okay, Ren?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... I'm sorry... @There's just so many people...

group_1.textRight: That's quite all right. @Let's go over there to get some rest.
I was completely unaware that today was free admission day at Minagi Sea.

group_1.textLeft: I'm not... very good with crowded places like this...

group_1.textRight: I see... @What a shame.
The cafe here is illuminated at night.
I must say there are many lovers who recommend @this place as an excellent proposal spot.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you mean... @This is a really... significant place?
Something like that...@It's too early for me... Yeah...

group_1.textRight: Ah, but it’s never too early to think of these @sorts of things, you know?
What’s wrong?

group_1.textLeft: I'd also like to visit a place... that you... @would personally... recommend...yeah...

group_1.textRight: That I would personally recommend... [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301001:motion_1][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]@Hm, very well! Follow me!
So... when exactly did you realize you liked the @person you're going out with?

group_1.textLeft: It was...from the first moment we met... @I have nothing but... gratitude for them...
And I never even have to...say a single word...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see...
Sounds like someone who's pretty grown-up @and put together.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...they really pay attention to...the people @around them. I think...it's really amazing... Yeah...

group_1.textRight: I swear! That's one fine catch you've landed!
It seems I mustn't underestimate you either!
Here we are!
This is the perfect place to view the Minagi Harbor @at night.
It’s incredibly beautiful and romantic!
Especially with all the Christmas lights @and decorations shimmering on the water.

group_1.textLeft: Have you come here...@With someone you cherish, Ria?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Well... I mean... Like a significant other, maybe?
I assumed you knew so much about these things... @Because you go to these places with them...

group_1.textRight: Ah... Y-You’re exactly right! @I've been here with my boyfriend!
H-He checks out trendy places like these for me @all the time.
No, well, yes, but...[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:301001:motion_200][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1] @Well that’s enough about me!
This is another one of the places he looked into. @What do you think?
It’s a flyer for the Minagi Aquarium.
They're hosting a special event called @"Night at the Aquarium."

group_1.textLeft: I wonder... What kind of event it is...

group_1.textRight: It's about what the aquarium looks like at night.
Indeed. It seems like they keep the facility dark, @but illuminate the tanks with special lighting.
It creates a romantic space... @And a very mystical atmosphere.
It's being described by the media as the latest @holiday trend.

group_1.textLeft: (What would...all those lights illuminating @the aquarium... look like...?)

group_1.textRight: Alright, one more place to go!

group_1.textLeft: ...So why exactly did you save our restaurant @for last?

group_1.textRight: Because a date should always end at a restaurant!
Is something the matter, Ren?

group_1.textLeft: Um... The one I'm going out on Christmas Eve @with...is Rika...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]R-Rika Ayano?!
You mean this isn't a date with your boyfriend?! @You certainly didn't mention that!

group_1.textLeft: I think it’s more that you misunderstood what @was going on and jumped to conclusions.

group_1.textRight: Jeez!
Oh... Th-that's not...

group_1.textLeft: It must be fun to fly off into your own little world.
